title: Shockwaves Of A Kidnapping Echo In 'Barefoot Dogs'
teaser: Alan Cheuse reviews Antonio Ruiz-Camacho's first book, a collection of interwoven short stories called, Barefoot Dogs. He's a Mexican-born writer who spent much of his career as a reporter.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
